name: capture_screenshot
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webcap_website_screenshot_capture.
Tool description: Turn websites into high definition screenshot images super quick and super easy. Simply provide a URL and the API will generate a screenshot for you. The returned file will be cached for continuous use
API description: Captures a screenshot of the specified website and returns the observation JSON or text from the API response.

url.description: The URL of the website to capture a screenshot of.
